title: srI krisNa guru
sahitya:
shrI krishNa guru sarva bhowmA (nI)
krEkaNti krupa jUpumA nAdasudhAkara

anupallavi

shrIkara shubhAkara madhura gAnAmruta
sAgaramE velayu sunAdapradarshita

caraNam

Ashruta kalpita sangItamE
sAswata samyOga sAdanamE
Ishwara prasAdamaNi pragidincina
suswaramaina sadA gAyakapriya
